transitionCalculus.comment: Divide the voltage peak value by the current peak value. Determine the peak value by comparing the smoothed threshold extremum value with the smoothed reference and recovery extremum values.

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Divide the voltage peak value by the current peak value. Determine the peak value by comparing the smoothed threshold extremum value with the smoothed reference and recovery extremum values.

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Divide the voltage pulse value by the current pulse value. Determine the pulse value by comparing the smoothed threshold extremum value with the smoothed reference and recovery extremum values.

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Divide the voltage pulse value by the current pulse value. Determine the pulse value by comparing the smoothed threshold extremum value with the smoothed reference and recovery extremum values.

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Divide the voltage slope delta value by the current slope delta value. Determine the slope delta value by comparing the smoothed threshold extremum value with the smoothed reference values.

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Divide the voltage slope delta value by the current slope delta value. Determine the slope delta value by comparing the smoothed threshold extremum value with the smoothed reference values.

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Divide the voltage peak value by the current peak value. Determine the peak value by comparing the smoothed threshold extremum value with the smoothed reference value (and recovery extremum value in case of peaks and pulses).

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Voltage delta devided by current delta, based on the smoothed reference ad recovery levels average

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Voltage delta devided by current delta, based on the smoothed reference ad recovery levels average

property.name: factor

transitionCalculus.comment: based on slope and peak transitions - this delivers the best results

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient wird in Promille geliefert und entspricht somit milliOhm

transitionCalculus.comment: Current delta value used for Ri calculation. Minmax leveling is based on a minimum quantile; the delta value takes an average value from the reference and recovery levels and subtracts the threshold level value. For test only.
A value close to 100% gives the best accuracy for Ri calculation. For test only

property.name: factor
property.description: Quotient holds the current delta value devided by the current spread (= I_max minus I_min)

TransitionGroup.comment: R_i transitions based on current values

Transition.comment: Stromeinbruch auf wenigstens ein Zwanzigstel mit Wiederanstieg auf mindestens 90%; Dauer höchstens 15 Sekunden
Stromspitze mit mindestens dem 20-fachen Wert mit Wiederabfall auf wenigstens den zweifachen Wert; Dauer höchstens 15 Sekunden
Stromimpuls über 5 A über min 7 Sekunden
Stromeinbruch auf wenigstens ein Zwanzigstel mit Wiederanstieg auf mindestens 90%; Pulsdauer mindestens 1,5 Sekunden
Stromanstieg auf mindestens den 20-fachen Wert mit Wiederabfall auf wenigstens den zweifachen Wert; Pulsdauer mindestens 1,5 Sekunden
Stromeinbruch auf wenigstens ein Zwanzigstel; Einbruchschwellwert mindestens 1,5 Sekunden
Stromanstieg auf mindestens den 20-fachen Wert; Anstiegschwellwert mindestens 1,5 Sekunden

property.name: outlier_sigma
property.description: 3.29 sigma allows 0.1% outliers, i.e. we allow 1 lower and 1 upper outlier for a population of 2000 measurements

property.name: outlier_range_factor
property.description: outliers are identified only if they lie beyond the base population IQR multiplied by 2.0; must be greater than 1.0
